revised_title: Decisive Steps Towards Control of the Desert Locust: 1952-1962
tldr: This article discusses the development of locust control strategies, focusing on the Desert Locust, from 1952 to 1962. The author highlights the importance of preventive measures and the use of new techniques and resources to control locust populations and protect crops in affected regions. The article also emphasizes the role of international organizations and cooperation in achieving these successes.
